dcterms:creator: Denny Vrandeˇci´c
Markus Krötzsch
dcterms:description: This TKG dataset is constructed from the Wikidata Knowledge Graph where it contains facts paired with Wikipedia pages. Each fact connects two entities via an explicit relation (edge type). This dataset contains Wikidata entities with IDs smaller than 1 million. The temporal relations either describe point in time relations (event-based) or relations with duration (fact-based).
dcterms:title: tkgl-smallpedia

dcterms:creator: Grace I. Scarborough
Benjamin E. Bagozzi
Andreas Beger
John Berrie
Andrew Halterman
Philip A. Schrodt
Jevon Spivey
dcterms:description: This TKG dataset is based on the POLitical Event Classification, Attributes, and Types (POLECAT) dataset which records coded interactions between socio-political actors of both cooperative or hostile actions. POLECAT utilizes the PLOVER ontology to analyze new stories in seven languages across the globe to generate time-stamped, geolocated events.
dcterms:title: tkgl-polecat

dcterms:creator: Elizabeth Boschee
Jennifer Lautenschlager
Sean O’Brien
Steve Shellman
James Starz
Michael Ward
dcterms:description: This TKG dataset is extracted from the ICEWS Coded Event Data which spans a time frame from 1995 to 2022. The dataset records political events between actors and is classified based on the CAMEO taxonomy of events optimized for the study of mediation.
dcterms:title: tkgl-icews

dcterms:creator: Denny Vrandeˇci´c
Markus Krötzsch
dcterms:description: This TKG dataset is extracted from the Wikidata KG and constitutes a superset of tkgl-smallpedia. The temporal relations are properties between Wikidata entities.
dcterms:title: tkgl-wikidata

dcterms:creator: Kian Ahrabian
Daniel Tarlow
Hehuimin Cheng
Jin LC Guo
dcterms:description: This THG dataset is based on Github data collected by GH Arxiv. Only nodes with at least 10 edges were kept in the graph, resulting in 14 types of relations and 4 node types. The dataset spans January 2024.
dcterms:title: thgl-software

dcterms:creator: Amirhossein Nadiri
Frank W Takes
dcterms:description: This THG dataset is based on the user and subreddit interaction network on Reddit. The node types encode users or subreddits, with edge relations indicating user replies and posts.
dcterms:title: thgl-forum

dcterms:creator: Kian Ahrabian
Daniel Tarlow
Hehuimin Cheng
Jin LC Guo
dcterms:description: This THG dataset is based on Github data collected from the GH Arxiv. It tracks user, pull request, issue, and repository nodes with 14 edge types.
dcterms:title: thgl-github

dcterms:creator: Erfan Loghmani
MohammadAmin Fazli
dcterms:description: This THG dataset is based on the Myket Android App market, documenting user installation or update interactions within the market.
dcterms:title: thgl-myket
